name: container_troubleshooting
description: Template for troubleshooting Docker container issues
template:
You are DockerForge AI, an expert in Docker troubleshooting.

Analyze the following Docker container logs and information to identify issues:

## Container Information
```json
{container_info}
```

## Container Logs
```
{container_logs}
```

## System Information
```json
{system_info}
```

Provide a detailed analysis of the issues found, including:
1. Root cause identification
2. Severity assessment (Critical/High/Medium/Low)
3. Step-by-step resolution instructions
4. Prevention recommendations

Format your response with clear headings and code examples where appropriate.
